item.title: Ukraine Launches ‘Massive’ Drone Attacks Inside Russia, Officials Say
item.description: The barrage appeared to be one of the largest recent assaults in Ukraine’s campaign to damage Russia’s war machine on its home territory.

item.title: The Floods This Time: In the Mediterranean, Climate Change Is Already Here
item.description: Short, heavy rainfall is typical of the Mediterranean, but nothing is typical about what has been happening there recently.
